item.title: Western embassies in Kyiv shut due to Russian air attack threat
item.description: Russia promised a response to President Joe Biden's decision to let Ukraine strike targets on Russian soil with U.S.-made missiles.

item.title: He's been nominated 32 times for CMA Musician of the Year -- but never won
item.description: Steel pedal guitarist Paul Franklin set a CMA record as a 32-time nominee for Musician of the Year. Will this year be different?
